entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:28 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %

Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:05 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:05 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:05 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
